title: Equipment Finance Industry confidence eases again in March - Fleet Equipment Magazine
content: Equipment Finance Industry confidence eases again in March  Fleet Equipment Magazine
description: The Equipment Leasing and Finance Foundation released the March 2022 Monthly Confidence Index for the Equipment Finance Industry (MCI-EFI). The index reports a qualitative assessment of both the prevailing business conditions and expectations for the future as reported by key executives from the $900 billion equipment finance sector. Overall, confidence in the equipment finance market is 58.2, easing […]
